panels.description: Shows how much Go is using from the amount of memory the Prometheus process is using from the kernel

panels.description: Shows the number of goroutined that currently exists

panels.description: Shows the current number of used file descriptors

panels.description: Shows delta of used file descriptors. A positive value shows newly opened descriptors, a negative value shows closed descriptors.
panels.title: Open / closed fds delta
